title: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent java file icon to a generic file icon.
OB: When using the SaveAs functionality, the file is saved without a file extension. The Navigator displays the file without the file extension.
EB: The file should be saved with the same extension as the original unless explicitly changed. The file should be displayed with the correct file extension in the Navigator.
SR:
To reproduce:
1) Open an existing java file.
2) Make modifications to the file.
3) Click the SaveAs icon, located next to the Save Icon.
4) A dialog will appear.
5) Browse for a valid container location.
6) Type the filename without the extension (as the extension is not requested).
7) Click OK.

Observe that the file is saved in the specified location but does not have a file extension displayed in the Navigator.
